description: This file provides functions for establishing and managing WebSocket connections for a ping monitoring service in a React project.

methods.name: deriveWsBase()
methods.description: Derives the WebSocket base URL based on environment variables or defaults to localhost.

methods.name: buildWsUrl(sessionId)
methods.description: Builds the WebSocket URL including session ID query parameter.

methods.name: connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError })
methods.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection to receive ping stream messages with callback handlers.

ctags.name: connectPingStream
ctags.pattern: /^export function connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError }) {$/
